bcbioBase
  • Reference
  • News

bcbioBase

Base functions and generics for bcbio R packages.

Installation

This is an R package.

Bioconductor method

source("https://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
biocLite(
    "hbc/bcbioBase",
    dependencies = c("Depends", "Imports", "Suggests")
)

conda method

conda install -c bioconda r-bcbiobase
